installer.title: BatchExpert+
installer.description: Installer for ILS Automation's Batch Expert+

panel.title: ILS Automation Installer for Testing Batch Expert+
panel.preamble: Welcome to the ILS Automation installer for Batch Expert+. The table below compares the existing installation of Batch Expert+ Test, if any, with the versions contained in this new installation. Before continuing, please make sure that you have defined the database connection "BE_TEST" and tag provider "BE_TEST". These are used exclusively for testing.

panel.title: Site Selection
panel.preamble: This install package contains customer-specific information. Select the customer appropriate to the current installation. WARNING: This package is intended for use by ILS Automation only as it contains information from multiple customers.

panel.title: Define tags provider and database connections
panel.preamble: Specify the database connection and DBMS-type that become the demonstration project defaults.

panel.title: Update schema for Batch Expert+
panel.preamble: Alter the existing database schema to bring it up-to-date with Batch Expert+. The datasource and DBMS type have been set on the definition panel.

panel.title: Install Tags and UDT Definitions
panel.preamble: This page defines UDTs and tags used for testing BatchExpert+. These are memory tag equivalents using provider BE_TEST.

panel.title: Install Custom Modules
panel.preamble: This step installs the ILS test framework module.

panel.title: Merge current Batch Expert+ windows into an existing project. Select the option to create a backup before changes are made. This update will not change anything in the "Site" directory.
panel.preamble: Batch Expert is the main Ignition project. This page provides artifacts for a clean, new installation or, alternatively, a merge with an existing version. A merge preserves any user modifications.

panel.title: Installation Summary
panel.preamble: The list below shows which of the installation steps have been completed. Selecting "Finish" will record the current version of ACE Ignition Applications in the Gateway internal database.

epilog.title: Installation Complete
epilog.preamble: The automated installation and configuration of Batch Expert+ is complete. There are just a few more manual steps required.
epilog.note: Newly created projects are installed disabled. They must be enabled before use.
Several modules with active components have been installed. A Gateway restart is required.
